description: Doesn't start on Fedora 29, it fails (worse: silently, please at least give a dialog for a flatpak app). If launching from the terminal , I see that it's due to the error "Error getting function pointers. LibEGL must be too old.".  This even happens with mesa master.

Just to address earlier review, it launches without issues on Fedora 32.
Easy browsing of all the mesa tweaking.
summary: Lots of tweaking for AMD Radeon RX 5700XT
